room_title: Escape room "The Zen Room" by Roomination Escape in Providence
room_description: As agents of an elite global security force, you are sent to investigate the disappearance of your organization's lead cryptologist.  You begin with a search of her office and find that you've unwittingly walked into a trap!  There's more to this mystery than meets the eye.  Find the hidden flash drive, decrypt the data, and get out before it's too late.  Can you escape the Zen room?
